TopicTitle: Reprogram Action Groups on the Fly?

Articles.Content:
Is there anyway (or mod) that allows one to reprogram a ship's action groups?

Edited October 9, 2013 by RuBisCO
IIRC there is actually a mod called "action groups on the fly". which would be your best bet. No idea myself how well it works though.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/actions-on-the-fly/

Works pretty good, you just right click the main part, and then you can right click any part and pick an action and it shows what groups it's in and lets you change them.

Unfortunately you can't see all the things is group 1 or whatever, you have to go to each part to see if it's in a group, can be quite slow if you have a lot of actions to set.
Wow the title of that mod says it all.
